channel.title: Tone on Hugh's Curriculum Vitae
channel.description: Recent content in Tone on Hugh's Curriculum Vitae

item.title: Automatic Speech Recognition
item.description: Working with several collaborators on Automatic Speech Recognition for low-resource tone languages.

item.title: Tone in Whispered Speech Bibliography
item.description: This is a short non-exhaustive bibliography of instigations and their reports when looking at tone in whispered speech.

item.title: Phonetic transcription of tone in the IPA
item.description: This was a poster presentation of the full published paper mentioned here. Citeable as Hugh J. Paterson III (2015) Phonetic transcription of tone in the IPA. Poser presentation at ICPhS 2015. 18th International Conference of Phonetic Sciences. University of Glasgow: Glasgow, UK. Though you should probably just cite the paper which is citeable as: Hugh J. Paterson III (2015) Phonetic transcription of tone in the IPA. In The Scottish Consortium for ICPhS 2015 (Ed.

item.title: Phonetic transcription of tone in the IPA
item.description: This was a poster presentation presented at the 18th International Conference of Phonetic Sciences in 2015. Links are to the poster and the 5 page paper is in the conference proceedings. Citeable as: Hugh J. Paterson III (2015) Phonetic transcription of tone in the IPA. In The Scottish Consortium for ICPhS 2015 (Ed.). Proceedings of the 18th International Conference of Phonetic Sciences Paper number 507.1-5. University of Glasgow: Glasgow, UK.
